00023 void TrafficSourceAppBase::initialize()
00024 {
00025     scheduleAt(simTime(), new cMessage("ACTIVATOR!"));
00026 }
00027 
00028 void TrafficSourceAppBase::sendMessage(){
00029     CTFrame *frame = new CTFrame("");
00030     frame->setByteLength(par("payload").longValue()+ETHER_MAC_FRAME_BYTES);
00031     //Padding
00032     if(frame->getByteLength()<MIN_ETHERNET_FRAME){
00033         frame->setByteLength(MIN_ETHERNET_FRAME);
00034     }
00035     int ctID = par("ct_id").longValue();
00036     if(ctID == -1){
00037 
00038     }
00039     else{
00040         frame->setCtID(ctID);
00041         std::list<Buffer*> buffer = buffers[ctID];
00042         if(buffer.size()==0){
00043             ev.printf("No buffer with such CT \n");
00044             bubble("No buffer with such CT");
00045             getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00046             getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: No buffer with such CT");
00047             getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00048             getParentModule()->getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "No buffer with such CT");
00049         }
00050         else{
00051             for(std::list<Buffer*>::iterator buf = buffer.begin();
00052                        buf!=buffer.end();buf++){
00053                 //TODO Error check
00054                 Incoming* in = (Incoming *)(*buf)->gate("in")->getPathStartGate()->getOwner();
00055                 //TODO Better name for Frame
00056                 frame->setName((*buf)->getName());
00057                 sendDirect(frame->dup(), in->gate("in"));
00058             }
00059         }
00060     }
00061     delete frame;
00062 }
